title: GSoC Update 6-6
author: Max (Dockerization)
content:
Snippets

  • Consulted with mentor about config details, decided on using docker environment variables for application config
  • Struggled a bit with configuring collector/encoder connectivity, but feel comfortable starting these docker containers from command line
  • glanced briefly at watchdog/register scripts for hooking into front-end, have yet to test fully

updates might be a bit brief for the next couple days, I have some very hard finals ahead.

Originally posted on Max S
